profile:
Award Winning Specialists!
416-236-8721

A&A Masonry is an award-winning Toronto based firm specializing in almost everything exterior.  Specialties include Stone work, Interlock, Interlocking, Paver stones, paving stones, Natural Stone, Pavers, Stone Veneer Cladding, Tuckpointing, Masonry, brick repair, brick restoration, tuck pointing, waterproofing, foundation repairs, concrete steps, porches, walkways, caulking services (windows & doors), chimney repair and general exterior restorations for residential, commercial and industrial customers.

A&A is dedicated to providing the highest quality on every job. With a proud team of qualified artisans, we strive to complete every project in a timely and safe manner.

Our mission is to offer a unique and reliable service in anything Exterior within the Greater Toronto Area, differentiating ourselves from the competition by means of always delivering what we promise, on time and on budget.

Our commitment to excellence is our core value.
Customer satisfaction is our main goal, and we reach it every day by relying on our attention to customer service. By providing customized solutions for every job, we guarantee that we will never compromise on quality, safety and efficiency.

This approach together with our experience and knowledge allows us to effectively handle a wide variety of projects, from small to big, indoors or outdoors, renovations or repairs. 

We service:  Toronto, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, York, North York, East York, Mimico, Hamilton, Brampton, Bolton and surrounding areas. 

For FREE ESTIMATE CALL: 416-236-8721

Being Masonry Contractors, Concrete Contractors, Stone  Contractors & Waterproofing Contractors we specialize in:
Stone work, Interlocking Natural Stone & Pavers, Stone Veneer Cladding, Tuckpointing, Tuck Pointing, Chimney Repair, Chimney Rebuild, Chimney Restoration, tuckpointing, Brickwork, Brick Repair, Brick Replacement, Parging, Waterproofing, Foundation Repair, Concrete Resurfacing, Concrete Porches, Concrete Steps, Patios and Walkways, Flagstone, Cultured Stone, Caulking services (windows and doors), Masonry, Masonry repair, steps, concrete porches, concrete walkways and patios, caulking services.

For the Hamilton area please visit out Hamilton websites

https://hamiltonconcrete.ca

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
Hello! my name is Andrew Murray I am the owner of Murrays Masonry an honest hard working company founded in 2014. Murrays Masonry is committed to providing its clients with the best craftsmanship and client care in the industry! Murrays Masonry specializes in a wide range of natural stone projects. Fireplaces, chimneys, accent walls, pizza ovens, outdoor fireplaces, full house builds, etc. Natural stone is a beautiful look to add to any home or landscape! let us help you pick the right stone and colour for your next project! Not to worry we don't just do stone! any aspect of masonry is not out of our range of expertise! Brick repair-install, Block repair-install, tuck-pointing, concrete, etc. Murrays Masonry is committed to making sure they look and feel desired of any project is met with timely service and attention to detail! Murrays Masonry would love to hear you reach out about your next project! 
 
Call us today for a free estimate! 905 580 1632 Thanks! Have a Great Day!

profile:
Fix My Brick has been operating for over 20 years, and we have developed loyal relationships with customers that recognize the effort and detail we commit to every project.

Fix My Brick employs a problem-solving approach to masonry and delivers superior support and attentive workmanship to all our customers. We are continuously pursing industry certifications and continuing education to provide a world-class service and industry-dominant masonry work. Our skilled artisans are experienced in all facets of brick work and they communicate every step to arrive at the greatest results.

Providing detailed evaluations and committed to the highest ethical standards, we proceed with extreme caution and with the care in mind that considers all of your property’s needs.In Hamilton, Fix My Brick is the contractor that transforms landscapes with immaculate masonry techniques.

profile:
As a family owned business Albany has had an opportunity to work closely with all of its trades people and sales staff to delivery remarkable workmanship at a fair market value. 

Albany and its staff constantly strives to educate all our customers on industry leading products, services and standards. Albany also strives to advise all its customers to spend wisely and practically to ensure their property integrity is considered before embarking on custom remodelling. 

Kim Garnet - Owner/Operator

Kim has been in the contract renovations business for over 35 years. Kim, a graduate of Ryerson Poly Technical Institute (Ryerson University), holds a Master builders Licence in the city of Hamilton. Kim has completed and delivered thousands of projects over his career and always strives to educate and satisfy his customers in every way he can. Working on all facets of low-rise residential and commercial projects there is little Kim won't have the know how to tackle. 

Joey Garnet - Sales & Operations

Joey, Kim's youngest son, is a fresh face to Albany. He has grown up in the business and has had a keen eye since his start, coming up with creative solutions for many of Albany's customers. Joey holds Hon. Bachelors degree from York University and a Diploma from Seneca College. Now with a 7 years experience under his belt, Joey has truly become a key contributor to Albany's success. Always helping deliver consistent quality and keeping all of Albany's customers confident through the process.  

Alex N.  Sales 

Alex is an experienced, qualified and dedicated person. He always looking to advise our customers to prioritize their projects and promote high quality government approved products.

Kazik R. / Bogdan H. / Andre P. / Frank A. / Patrick W. / Chris M. / Joe P. / Jeff H. / Frank C. / Sam S. / Ferraud J. / Albert V. / Tino C. / Jerimiah M. / Josié F. / Mike G. / Pope S. / Natalie P. - Trade Teams 

Our trade teams are made up multiple workers who have an enormous amount of experience and specialize in multiple areas of renovations. These areas include but are no limited to: 

Carpentry

Windows/doors/garage doors/sky lights

Eaves trough/soffit/fascia/siding/aluminum capping

Kitchens/Bathrooms

Pluming/Electrical

Painting/finishing

Roofing

Car Ports

Concrete/concrete finishing/concrete walls/concrete curbing/Parge coating

Interlock/lock walls/retaining walls

Flag stone facing/ colonial stone facing

Wood fencing/wood decking

Brick work/Brick replacement/Tuck Pointing/ Chimney repair & rebuild

Stucco

Exterior and interior water proofing/sump pumps

Wood/laminate/tile flooring

Asphalt Drive ways

Aluminum awnings/railings /fencing

Chainlink fencing

profile:
EXCELLENCE AND PROFESSIONALISM

We endeavor to create the most  impressive re-construction of historic masonry designs left behind by past generation builders. With excellent workmanship and a very well rounded  knowledge of building construction we are able to restore & rehabilitate all masonry structures.

PERSONALIZED APPROACH
Every project that we construct starts with a strong customer-orientated relationship, which means working together to exceed all expectations.  Start to finish, we believe in strong communication and like to keep you informed on each procedure of the operation.


EXCELLENCE AND PROFESSIONALISM
We endeavor to create the most  impressive re-construction of historic masonry designs left behind by past generation builders. With excellent workmanship and a very well rounded  knowledge of building construction we are able to restore & rehabilitate all

masonry structures.

PERSONALIZED APPROACH
Every project that we construct starts with a strong customer-orientated relationship, which means working together to exceed all expectations.  Start to finish, we believe in strong communication and like to keep you informed on each procedure of the operation.

Leadership in Energy & Environmental Design
Essentially all masonry products can be recycled and reused. What the future holds for us is unknown, We can start today by making smarter choices on products used for building. One brick at a time we can give back the earth what we have taken, reducing our footprint and developing a sustainable planet for our future generations.

profile: Artistic Brickworx Inc. was founded in 2017 and we have over 20 years experience in commercial and residential masonry construction. We are a fully insured, full service masonry construction and renovation company servicing Hamilton and the surrounding areas. Whether you are looking to repair a chimney, build a new indoor or outdoor fireplace, install some updated windowsills, replace your exterior brick with new stone, tuck point and/or restore existing brick/stone walls, fix that caving walkout, get creative with new stairs, porches and patios, or build your dream house you can trust Artistic Brickworx Inc. to deliver high quality craftsmanship and professional service, on time and at affordable rates. Our mission is to treat you and your home with respect and provide guaranteed satisfaction.

profile:
No Job is too big or small for V&S Masonry
We are dedicated to providing the highest quality for every job. V&S strives to complete every project in a timely and safe manner. Our mission is to offer unique and reliable services whether you need a retaining wall, brick repair, brick restoration or a chimney rebuild we can handle it all. From the first consultation call, to the final curing; we'll be there at every step. Call us today to find out more about how we can help on your next project. Top-notch quality. 25 years of experience. Give V&S Masonry a call today!


Laying bricks and blocks. Chimney building and repairs. Tuck-pointing deteriorated mortar joints and replacing shaled, or porous bricks (restoration) Laying stone with mortar, and dry stacking. Pouring footings, columns, support pads. Cement repairs. Cement coatings.
